column2: Alcoa to cut production at Quebec smelter May 16 Alcoa Inc said on Thursday it is permanently closing two potlines at its Baie-Comeau smelter in Quebec
column5: and delaying the construction of a new potline at the facility.

column2: A stretched Samsung chases rival Apple's suppliers SEOUL
column3: May 17 Overtaking Apple Inc as the world's leading maker of smartphones has stretched Samsung Electronics Co's in-house supply lines
column4: and the South Korean firm is now courting some of its rival's main parts suppliers.

column2: UPDATE 2-Applied Materials says smartphone-chip demand to aid revenue SAN FRANCISCO
column4: a maker of equipment used to manufacture chips
column5: said on Thursday that demand for smartphone chips will help increase its revenues slightly in the current quarter and offset slowing demand from manufacturers hurt by slumping PC sales.

column2: Autodesk reports lower quarterly profit May 16 Autodesk Inc
column4: reported a lower quarterly profit as license revenue fell 9 percent.
